meanings.definition: The act of running from base to base in baseball.
meanings.sent1: During the game, his baserunning was fast and strategic.
meanings.sent2: Good baserunning can help a team score more runs.
meanings.sent3: The baserunning race between the players was intense and exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her baserunning was like a well-choreographed dance on the field.
meanings.sent5: The coach emphasized the importance of smart baserunning to the team.

meanings.definition: The skill or technique of running bases in baseball.
meanings.sent1: His baserunning improved after practicing with the team.
meanings.sent2: Players need to work on their baserunning to be more efficient.
meanings.sent3: The player's unique baserunning style caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: Her baserunning technique was as smooth as silk on the field.
meanings.sent5: The coach praised the team for their dedication to perfecting their baserunning skills.
